signing.mnemonic: <BIP39 mnemonic phrase - 12 or 24 words, used for --sign-type cli>
signing.did_key: <32-byte Ed25519 private key as hex, used for --sign-type did. Generate: openssl rand -hex 32>
signing.p256_key: <32-byte P-256 private key as hex, used for --sign-type p256. Generate: openssl rand -hex 32>

timestamp.nostr_sk: <Nostr secret key as hex or nsec bech32, used for --witness-nostr. Generate: openssl rand -hex 32>
